thread.section_title: Tailor4Less Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Tailor4Less | tailor4less.com
thread.title: Dustin THomas

author: Dustin THomas
title: Dustin THomas
text: I tried Tailor4Less a few weeks ago for a custom tailored blazer. I found the process really simple. I have used a similar site for dress shirts and learned that it is a best practice to do all of the measurements and not the basics. I did the same thing with this purchase. The blazer fits beautifully right out of the package. The fabric appears to be in line with my expectations. I will definitely be making another purchase through the site.
